messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
CentCom Counter Intelligence

Cargo: The syndicate are trying to infiltrate your station. If you let them hijack your cargo shuttle, you'll save us a headache.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Critical Power Failure

Abnormal activity detected in Space Station 13's powernet. As a precautionary measure, the station's power will be shut off for an indeterminate duration.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Nanotrasen Bounty Program

Central Command has issued a high-priority cargo bounty. Details have been sent to all bounty consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Critical Power Failure

Abnormal activity detected in Space Station 13's powernet. As a precautionary measure, the station's power will be shut off for an indeterminate duration.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to climate change, a swarm of wire eating mammals have swarmed into the maintenance tunnels.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Medium-Priority Update

Based on our sophisticated probabilistic models, we believe that one of the station's animals/bots has developed very low level intelligence, and the ability to communicate.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Critical Power Failure

Abnormal activity detected in Space Station 13's powernet. As a precautionary measure, the station's power will be shut off for an indeterminate duration.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Cargo shuttle commandeered by CentCom.

The cargo shuttle should return in five minutes. Have some supply points for your trouble.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Cook is traitor, saw him emagging to the armory

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Ionospheric anomalies detected. Temporary telecommunication failure imminent. Please contact you*%fj00)`5vc-BZZT

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Am i late to the shift?
